title: Understanding the Social Domain
text: The social domain refers to aspects of life that involve interactions and relationships with others. It is an important part of mental health and well-being.

title: Key Aspects of the Social Domain
text: Consider what it means to have a healthy social life. This often includes the ability to form friendships, maintain relationships, and interact positively with others.

hintAnswer: the individual’s ability to make friends and have relationships with others
title: Identifying the Social Domain
text: Which of the following best describes the social domain?
choices: the individual’s ability to make friends and have relationships with others
the individual’s ability to act independently in their personal care, job role, school and work tasks, and money management
a genetic disorder that involves the Fragile X Messenger Ribonucleoprotein $$1$$ (FMR1) gene responsible for producing a protein that helps brain development
when a fetus is exposed to alcohol during the prenatal period
